reviewText: When I was in the hospital three years ago, there was a tv channel where this ran on a loop.  I tuned in everyday to help me relax -- sometimes when I was trying to get to sleep, sometimes before or after a procedure. It made my problems feel smaller.  If you're an ocean-lover like me, you will surely benefit from the beautiful images and music.  I still think of this video when I'm feeling low and need a reminder that things will be ok.

I got this as a gift for my sister-in-law who is working her way through breast cancer.  She said she loves it and it's part of the regime recommended by her coach - spending time each day to de-stress and focus on positive things.
